parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Prepares the camera target to a position or to a target. Needs the call of [[camCommitPrepared]] to be conducted.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera [[camPrepareTarget]] position

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]] - object of type "camera"

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> position: [[Position]] - target location

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> camera [[camPrepareTarget]] target

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]] - object of type "camera"

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> target: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_camera [[camPrepareTarget]] [[getPos]] [[player]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_camera [[camPrepareTarget]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[camPreload]], [[camCommitPrepared]], [[camSetTarget]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
